message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $1,600,000. I believe this reflects the true value of what's being offered.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $1,400,000.  I'm confident this price reflects the potential this product holds.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1,400,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,200,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to go.
